(2/2) The SCOTUS decision today to block the inclusion of a citizenship question in the 2020 Census is a sigh of relief for southern New Mexico, where accurately counting every resident is vital to all of our future successes.

(1/2) The decennial census is one of the most important responsibilities of the fed gov. It provides the basis for a decade of decisions about our democracy, where businesses open new locations, & how billions of fed funding are allocated to our local communities each year.
